__e: - A while back, Dick, Barry and I agreed.... - Just before I moved here. that what really matters is what you like... not what you are like.
We all agree then, anything happens, anyone comes to you talking about anything, I don't care what it is, you come to me first. It goes through me first.
Yeah, um... Look, I think we both know that what happened was, um... in the moment.
We agreed you're not being challenged enough, so we're going to send you somewhere else far away.
He dropped out of school over a girl who I think we all can agree was not very special.
I believe as time goes by we would all agree that there is no such thing as "too much love ".
- So, if we all agree that school sucks and that it shouldn't, then what's next, guys? Hmm?
You know how we agree that one of us needs to stay home and parent the kids and one of us needs to make a living?
No, you were supposed to be a parent and do what we agreed to do, which was nothing.
We agreed not to tell him but on the wedding day I had to tell him.
I know we agreed that whatever happened on break would stay on break, and I don't expect you to talk about yours.
Look, it's fine that you know, but we agreed not to tell anyone right now, and she just went ahead and did it anyway.
Yet it sounds like you and I finally have something to agree on.
You know, I think that's the first time we've actually agreed on something.
So glad we all agree on something.
I know we agreed that whatever happened on break would stay on break, and I don't expect you to talk about yours.
I'm sure we all agree in saying that it's good to see you back here, amongst friends.

We're all agreed on what our problem is.
